content.original: Aggressive Negotiations
content.prevOriginal: Aggressive Negotiations
content.content: Агрессивные переговоры

content.original: Commander, you're in the AO, and we're expecting hostile contacts.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, you're in the AO, and we're expecting hostile contacts.
content.content: Командующий, вы в зоне боевых действий и мы ожидаем контакт с врагом.

content.original: Recon has provided the general vicinity of the diplomat.
content.prevOriginal: Recon has provided the general vicinity of the diplomat.
content.content: Разведка докладывает: мы недалеко от искомого дипломата.

content.original: Take the target out, and get to the evac zone. Oliveira out.
content.prevOriginal: Take the target out, and get to the evac zone. Oliveira out.
content.content: Разберитесь с целью и отправляйтесь к зоне эвакуации. Оливейра, конец связи.

content.original: Mission accomplished. The target is dead. Well done, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Mission accomplished. The target is dead. Well done, Commander.
content.content: Миссия выполнена. Цель мертва. Хорошая работа, кэп.

content.original: Time to make a withdrawal. No way of getting out clean on this one.
content.prevOriginal: Time to make a withdrawal. No way of getting out clean on this one.
content.content: Пора делать ноги. Тут уж, как бы, наши полномочия всё.

content.original: Target eliminated. That's a confirmed kill. Time to head for the evac point.
content.prevOriginal: Target eliminated. That's a confirmed kill. Time to head for the evac point.
content.content: Цель устранена. Подтверждаю смерть пилота. Пора двигаться в точку эвакуации.

content.original: Readings indicate the ambushing units are out of commission. The employer will be pleased.
content.prevOriginal: Readings indicate the ambushing units are out of commission. The employer will be pleased.
content.content: Насколько я вижу, враг уже не устроит тут засады. Работодатель будет доволен.

content.original: That is our target, sustain fire on that unit!
content.prevOriginal: That is our target, sustain fire on that unit!
content.content: Вот и наша цель. Советую сконцентрировать весь огонь на ней.

content.original: Sensors are showing enemy movement beyond our initial count. Be advised you might meet with increased resistance.
content.prevOriginal: Sensors are showing enemy movement beyond our initial count. Be advised you might meet with increased resistance.
content.content: Сенсоры показывают передвижение неизвестных целей. Имейте в виду, возможно будет жёстче, чем предполагалось.

content.original: Commander, the target is bugging out! Eliminate them before they escape.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, the target is bugging out! Eliminate them before they escape.
content.content: Командир, противник решил, что ему пора валить! Действуйте, пока не стало поздно.

content.original: Commander, this isn't likely to be resolved by one dead diplomat. Situations like this are good for repeat business.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, this isn't likely to be resolved by one dead diplomat. Situations like this are good for repeat business.
content.content: Командир, не похоже, что ситуация разрешится со смертью одного дипломата. Возможно, у нас будет ещё работёнка.

content.original: Destroy the Escorts
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the Escorts
content.content: Уничтожьте эскорт

content.original: Destroy the Reinforcements
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the Reinforcements
content.content: Уничтожьте подкрепления

content.original: Eliminate the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Diplomat
content.prevOriginal: Eliminate the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Diplomat
content.content: Устраните дипломата, работающего на {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym}

content.original: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance
content.prevOriginal: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance
content.content: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance

content.original: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective
content.prevOriginal: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective
content.content: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective

content.original: Get to the Evac Zone
content.prevOriginal: Get to the Evac Zone
content.content: Доберитесь до зоны эвакуации

content.original: Stop the Target from Escaping
content.prevOriginal: Stop the Target from Escaping
content.content: Не дайте цели сбежать

content.original: Armor of the Target is breached.
content.prevOriginal: Armor of the Target is breached.
content.content: Броня цели повреждена.

content.original: Armor Breached
content.prevOriginal: Armor Breached
content.content: Броня пробита

content.original: We've been having troubles with {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} here in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} for months now, and our negotiations with them have been stalled by a stubborn {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} diplomat. If he were removed from the equation, through a random attack by "bandits" for instance, we might be able to make some headway.
content.prevOriginal: We've been having troubles with {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} here in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} for months now, and our negotiations with them have been stalled by a stubborn {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} diplomat. If he were removed from the equation, through a random attack by "bandits" for instance, we might be able to make some headway.
content.content: {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} уже несколько месяцев доставляет нам проблемы здесь, в системе {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, и наши переговоры с ними застопорились из-за упрямого дипломата, представителя {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym}. И, предположим, если бы он был, так сказать, «вынесен за скобки», может быть, посредством «случайного» рейда «неизвестных головорезов», мы могли бы добиться некоторого прогресса в дипломатии. Ну как, по рукам?

content.original: Dead or Alive
content.prevOriginal: Dead or Alive
content.content: Живым или мёртвым

content.original: We're only contracted for a single target here, but we both know it won't be that easy.
content.prevOriginal: We're only contracted for a single target here, but we both know it won't be that easy.
content.content: У нас здесь контракт только на одну цель, но мы оба знаем, что это будет не так просто.

content.original: The war criminal you're hunting won't be alone. The company of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} mercenaries that he's signed on with will attack you on sight.
content.prevOriginal: The war criminal you're hunting won't be alone. The company of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} mercenaries that he's signed on with will attack you on sight.
content.content: Военный преступник, за которым вы охотитесь, будет не один. {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} выслали отряд наемников, с которыми он подписал контракт. Они начнут атаковать вас без предупреждения.

content.original: Good hunting, Commander. Oliveira out.
content.prevOriginal: Good hunting, Commander. Oliveira out.
content.content: Удачной охоты, командир. Оливейра, конец связи.

content.original: All contract objectives complete! Good job, Commander. We're done here.
content.prevOriginal: All contract objectives complete! Good job, Commander. We're done here.
content.content: Все цели контракта выполнены! Отличная работа, командир. Здесь мы закончили.

content.original: That's it, I'm calling it. This mission is over, Commander - stand by for pickup.
content.prevOriginal: That's it, I'm calling it. This mission is over, Commander - stand by for pickup.
content.content: Вот и все, подтверждаю. Эта миссия окончена, командир - ждите, пока вас заберут.

content.original: Kill confirmed, Commander - the target is down and you are cleared for extraction. Get to the rendezvous with the Leopard, and Sumire will bring you home.
content.prevOriginal: Kill confirmed, Commander - the target is down and you are cleared for extraction. Get to the rendezvous with the Leopard, and Sumire will bring you home.
content.content: Убийство подтверждено, командир, - цель подбита и вы можете эвакуироваться. Доберитесь до места встречи с Леопардом и Сумирэ доставит вас домой.

content.original: Readings indicate the ambushing units are out of commission. The employer will be pleased.
content.prevOriginal: Readings indicate the ambushing units are out of commission. The employer will be pleased.
content.content: Насколько я вижу, враг уже не устроит тут засады. Работодатель будет доволен.

content.original: That is our target, sustain fire on that unit!
content.prevOriginal: That is our target, sustain fire on that unit!
content.content: А вот и наша цель, накройте ее концентрированным огнем!

content.original: Sensors are showing enemy movement beyond our initial count. Be advised you might meet with increased resistance.
content.prevOriginal: Sensors are showing enemy movement beyond our initial count. Be advised you might meet with increased resistance.
content.content: Сенсоры показывают передвижение неизвестных целей. Имейте в виду, возможно будет жёстче, чем предполагалось.

content.original: Commander, the target is bugging out! Eliminate them before they escape.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, the target is bugging out! Eliminate them before they escape.
content.content: Командир, цель выходит из боя! Уничтожьте ее, пока она не сбежала.

content.original: These days 'war criminal' basically means anyone on the other side of the battlefield. I wouldn't worry about that 'trial' comment. There won't be one.
content.prevOriginal: These days 'war criminal' basically means anyone on the other side of the battlefield. I wouldn't worry about that 'trial' comment. There won't be one.
content.content: В наши дни «военный преступник» означает любого, кто находится по другую сторону поля. Я бы не волновался о замечании про "судебное разбирательство". Его не будет.

content.original: Destroy Supporting {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Forces
content.prevOriginal: Destroy Supporting {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Forces
content.content: Уничтожьте силы, поддерживающие {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym}

content.original: Destroy enemy Ambushers before extraction
content.prevOriginal: Destroy enemy Ambushers before extraction
content.content: Уничтожьте засаду врага до эвакуации

content.original: Eliminate Ambushers
content.prevOriginal: Eliminate Ambushers
content.content: Устраните отряд засады

content.original: Eliminate Wanted MechWarrior
content.prevOriginal: Eliminate Wanted MechWarrior
content.content: Устраните разыскиваемого мехвоина

content.original: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance
content.prevOriginal: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance
content.content: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance

content.original: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective
content.prevOriginal: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective
content.content: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective

content.original: Get to the Evac Zone
content.prevOriginal: Get to the Evac Zone
content.content: Доберитесь до зоны эвакуации

content.original: Stop the Target from Escaping
content.prevOriginal: Stop the Target from Escaping
content.content: Не дайте цели сбежать

content.original: Armor of the Target is breached.
content.prevOriginal: Armor of the Target is breached.
content.content: Броня цели повреждена.

content.original: Armor Breached
content.prevOriginal: Armor Breached
content.content: Броня пробита

content.original: A wanted war criminal has been spotted on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. Unfortunately, he appears to have integrated himself into a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym}-aligned mercenary company. We need you to track him down and destroy his 'Mech. If he ejects, we'll take him into custody to be tried before a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} court. If not, no harm done - you'll be paid the same either way.
content.prevOriginal: A wanted war criminal has been spotted on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. Unfortunately, he appears to have integrated himself into a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym}-aligned mercenary company. We need you to track him down and destroy his 'Mech. If he ejects, we'll take him into custody to be tried before a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} court. If not, no harm done - you'll be paid the same either way.
content.content: Разыскиваемый военный преступник обнаружен на планете {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. К сожалению, он, похоже, внедрился к наёмникам, работающим на {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym}. Нам нужно, чтобы вы выследили его и уничтожили его мех. Если он катапультируется, мы возьмем его под стражу, чтобы он предстал перед судом {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym}. Если не выживет... ну... оплату вы так или иначе получите.

content.original: Frontier Justice
content.prevOriginal: Frontier Justice
content.content: Пограничное правосудие

content.original: There's only one target that matters on this drop, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: There's only one target that matters on this drop, Commander.
content.content: Здесь важна только одна цель, командир.

content.original: Sumire has already done a flyby and determined that our target is likely to be a short distance from you.
content.prevOriginal: Sumire has already done a flyby and determined that our target is likely to be a short distance from you.
content.content: Сумир уже провела воздушную разведку и определила, что наша цель, скорее всего, будет недалеко от вас.

content.original: Find the target, take her out, and proceed to the LZ for evac. Good hunting, Commander. Oliveira out.
content.prevOriginal: Find the target, take her out, and proceed to the LZ for evac. Good hunting, Commander. Oliveira out.
content.content: Найдите цель, уничтожьте ее и отправляйтесь в зону для эвакуации. Удачной охоты, командир. Оливейра, конец связи.

content.original: Excellent work as always, Commander. When you get back, drinks are on me.
content.prevOriginal: Excellent work as always, Commander. When you get back, drinks are on me.
content.content: Как всегда отличная работа, командир. Когда вернешься, с меня выпивка.

content.original: We're done here, Commander. Time to pack it in.
content.prevOriginal: We're done here, Commander. Time to pack it in.
content.content: Мы закончили здесь, командир. Время паковать вещи.

content.original: That's one fewer outlaw on the Frontier, Commander - well done. Get to the LZ for extraction.
content.prevOriginal: That's one fewer outlaw on the Frontier, Commander - well done. Get to the LZ for extraction.
content.content: Вот и на одного преступника меньше на передовой, командир, отличная работа. Отправляйтесь в зону эвакуации.

content.original: Readings indicate the ambushing units are out of commission. The employer will be pleased.
content.prevOriginal: Readings indicate the ambushing units are out of commission. The employer will be pleased.
content.content: Насколько я вижу, враг уже не устроит тут засады. Работодатель будет доволен.

content.original: That is our target, sustain fire on that unit!
content.prevOriginal: That is our target, sustain fire on that unit!
content.content: Вот и наша цель. Советую сконцентрировать весь огонь на ней.

content.original: Sensors are showing enemy movement beyond our initial count. Be advised you might meet with increased resistance.
content.prevOriginal: Sensors are showing enemy movement beyond our initial count. Be advised you might meet with increased resistance.
content.content: Сенсоры показывают передвижение неизвестных целей. Имейте в виду, возможно будет жёстче, чем предполагалось.

content.original: Commander, the target is bugging out! Eliminate them before they escape.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, the target is bugging out! Eliminate them before they escape.
content.content: Командир, цель пытается сбежать! Догоните и уничтожьте ее, пока не поздно.

content.original: If I had to guess, Commander, I'd say the 'outlaw' part of this is just propaganda. Outlaw or not, though, the payout's the same for us.
content.prevOriginal: If I had to guess, Commander, I'd say the 'outlaw' part of this is just propaganda. Outlaw or not, though, the payout's the same for us.
content.content: Если задуматься, командир, то я бы сказал, что «преступная» часть всего этого - это просто пропаганда. Но, вне закона или нет, выплаты для нас одинаковы.

content.original: Destroy the Enemy Forces
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the Enemy Forces
content.content: Уничтожьте вражеские силы

content.original: Eliminate {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} ambush team
content.prevOriginal: Eliminate {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} ambush team
content.content: Уничтожьте команду засады {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym}

content.original: Eliminate Ambushers
content.prevOriginal: Eliminate Ambushers
content.content: Устраните засаду

content.original: Destroy the Outlaw MechWarrior
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the Outlaw MechWarrior
content.content: Уничтожьте воина-преступника

content.original: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance
content.prevOriginal: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance
content.content: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance

content.original: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective
content.prevOriginal: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective
content.content: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective

content.original: Get to the Evac Zone
content.prevOriginal: Get to the Evac Zone
content.content: Доберитесь до зоны эвакуации

content.original: Stop the Outlaw from Escaping
content.prevOriginal: Stop the Outlaw from Escaping
content.content: Не дайте преступнику сбежать

content.original: Armor of the Target is breached.
content.prevOriginal: Armor of the Target is breached.
content.content: Броня цели повреждена.

content.original: Armor Breached
content.prevOriginal: Armor Breached
content.content: Броня пробита

content.original: We are offering a sizeable bounty for the head of a local outlaw. The target is a rogue {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} MechWarrior who has attacked {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} personnel and facilities in this system. We need a mercenary company to find her and take her down before she takes out her aggressions on any more of our settlements.
content.prevOriginal: We are offering a sizeable bounty for the head of a local outlaw. The target is a rogue {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} MechWarrior who has attacked {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} personnel and facilities in this system. We need a mercenary company to find her and take her down before she takes out her aggressions on any more of our settlements.
content.content: Мы предлагаем крупную награду за главу местных бандитов. Целью является мятежный мехвоин из {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym}, который атаковал персонал и здания, принадлежащие {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} в этой системе. Нам нужен отряд наемников, чтобы найти его и уничтожить, прежде чем он перенесёт свою агрессию на наши поселения.

content.original: Insurrection Interception
content.prevOriginal: Insurrection Interception
content.content: Перехват восстания

content.original: Commander, this is the region we've been asked to patrol as part of the net.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, this is the region we've been asked to patrol as part of the net.
content.content: Командир, это регион, который нас попросили патрулировать как часть сети.

content.original: Our employers need us to keep an eye out for the propaganda agent, as this is one possible escape route she might take.
content.prevOriginal: Our employers need us to keep an eye out for the propaganda agent, as this is one possible escape route she might take.
content.content: Нашим работодателям нужно, чтобы мы искали агента пропаганды в этой области, поскольку это один из возможных путей побега, которым она может воспользоваться.

content.original: If she's in this region, we need to find her and take her out. Then we can evac.
content.prevOriginal: If she's in this region, we need to find her and take her out. Then we can evac.
content.content: Если она в этом районе, нам нужно ее найти и вывезти. Затем мы сможем эвакуироваться.

content.original: Mission accomplished. The {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} propagandist is dead.
content.prevOriginal: Mission accomplished. The {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} propagandist is dead.
content.content: Миссия выполнена. Пропагандист {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} мертв.

content.original: That's a failure. I'll notify {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} to shift their net and try to catch her elsewhere.
content.prevOriginal: That's a failure. I'll notify {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} to shift their net and try to catch her elsewhere.
content.content: Это провал. Мне придётся сообщить людям из {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName}, что цель ушла.Они скорректируют оцепление поймают её в другом месте.

content.original: Target eliminated. We can clean up any remaining hostiles, or head for the evac zone.
content.prevOriginal: Target eliminated. We can clean up any remaining hostiles, or head for the evac zone.
content.content: Цель устранена. Мы можем убрать всех оставшихся противников или отправляться в зону эвакуации.

content.original: Readings indicate the ambushing units are out of commission. The employer will be pleased.
content.prevOriginal: Readings indicate the ambushing units are out of commission. The employer will be pleased.
content.content: Насколько я вижу, враг уже не устроит тут засады. Работодатель будет доволен.

content.original: That is our target, sustain fire on that unit!
content.prevOriginal: That is our target, sustain fire on that unit!
content.content: Вижу цель, сфокусируйте огонь на ней!

content.original: Sensors are showing enemy movement beyond our initial count. Be advised you might meet with increased resistance.
content.prevOriginal: Sensors are showing enemy movement beyond our initial count. Be advised you might meet with increased resistance.
content.content: Сенсоры показывают передвижение неизвестных целей. Имейте в виду, возможно будет жёстче, чем предполагалось.

content.original: Commander, the target is bugging out! Eliminate them before they escape.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, the target is bugging out! Eliminate them before they escape.
content.content: Командир, цель пытается сбежать! Догоните и уничтожьте ее, пока не поздно.

content.original: I've negotiated a major bump if we DO end up finding the propagandist and eliminating her, as well as a danger-pay bonus if she has any escorts and we eliminate them as well.
content.prevOriginal: I've negotiated a major bump if we DO end up finding the propagandist and eliminating her, as well as a danger-pay bonus if she has any escorts and we eliminate them as well.
content.content: Я договорился о серьезной премии, если мы действительно НАЙДЁМ пропагандиста и устраним ее, а также о надбавке, если у нее будет эскорт и мы его тоже устраним.

content.original: Destroy Supporting Enemy Forces
content.prevOriginal: Destroy Supporting Enemy Forces
content.content: Уничтожьте вражеский отряд поддержки

content.original: Eliminate Ambushers
content.prevOriginal: Eliminate Ambushers
content.content: Устраните отряд засады

content.original: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Propagandist
content.prevOriginal: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Propagandist
content.content: Уничтожьте пропагандиста {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym}

content.original: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance
content.prevOriginal: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance
content.content: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance

content.original: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective
content.prevOriginal: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective
content.content: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective

content.original: Get to the Evac Zone
content.prevOriginal: Get to the Evac Zone
content.content: Доберитесь до зоны эвакуации

content.original: Stop the Target from Escaping
content.prevOriginal: Stop the Target from Escaping
content.content: Не дайте цели сбежать

content.original: Armor of the Target is breached.
content.prevOriginal: Armor of the Target is breached.
content.content: Броня цели повреждена.

content.original: Armor Breached
content.prevOriginal: Armor Breached
content.content: Броня пробита

content.original: For months, we've had trouble with people here in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} being riled up by talk of insurrection, rebellion, independence. Based on top {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} analysts' reports, we believe there's a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} propagandist in the area, stirring up discontent. We've set up a security net to capture her. But we can't cover every possible exit from our net and could use an extra Lance of 'Mechs. If she tries to slip through your assigned territory, turn her unit to slag.
content.prevOriginal: For months, we've had trouble with people here in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} being riled up by talk of insurrection, rebellion, independence. Based on top {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} analysts' reports, we believe there's a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} propagandist in the area, stirring up discontent. We've set up a security net to capture her. But we can't cover every possible exit from our net and could use an extra Lance of 'Mechs. If she tries to slip through your assigned territory, turn her unit to slag.
content.content: В течение нескольких месяцев у нас были проблемы с людьми здесь, на {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, которых раздражали разговоры о мятеже, восстании и независимости. Основываясь на отчётах ведущих аналитиков {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym}, мы полагаем, что в этом районе есть пропагандист {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym}, вызывающий недовольство. Мы создали защитный периметр, чтобы захватить ее. Но мы не можем покрыть все возможные выходы и могли бы использовать дополнительный отряд мехов. Если она попытается проскользнуть через назначенную вам территорию, превратите ее отряд в шлак.

content.original: Key Personnel
content.prevOriginal: Key Personnel
content.content: Ключевой персонал

content.original: Commander, our intel was right; the target is in the AO and only lightly guarded.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, our intel was right; the target is in the AO and only lightly guarded.
content.content: Командующий, наша информация была верна: цель находится в указанном районе и слабо охраняется.

content.original: We're seeing a lot of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} activity in the vicinity of the target.
content.prevOriginal: We're seeing a lot of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} activity in the vicinity of the target.
content.content: Мы наблюдаем много активности от {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} в непосредственной близости от цели.

content.original: Take them out, get to the evac zone, and then we get paid.
content.prevOriginal: Take them out, get to the evac zone, and then we get paid.
content.content: Разбейте их, доберитесь до зоны эвакуации и тогда нам заплатят.

content.original: The target is down, Commander. Well done. We'll debrief back in orbit.
content.prevOriginal: The target is down, Commander. Well done. We'll debrief back in orbit.
content.content: Цель сбита, командир. Отлично сработано. Дебрифинг на орбите через  2 часа.

content.original: I'm scrubbing the mission, Commander. What a disaster.
content.prevOriginal: I'm scrubbing the mission, Commander. What a disaster.
content.content: Я отменяю задание, командир. Это катастрофа.

content.original: That's a confirmed kill, Commander. We can evac whenever you're ready.
content.prevOriginal: That's a confirmed kill, Commander. We can evac whenever you're ready.
content.content: Убийство подтверждаю, командир. Мы можем эвакуироваться, когда пожелаете.

content.original: Readings indicate the ambushing units are out of commission. The employer will be pleased.
content.prevOriginal: Readings indicate the ambushing units are out of commission. The employer will be pleased.
content.content: Насколько я вижу, враг уже не устроит тут засады. Работодатель будет доволен.

content.original: That is our target, sustain fire on that unit!
content.prevOriginal: That is our target, sustain fire on that unit!
content.content: Вот и наша цель. Советую сконцентрировать весь огонь на ней.

content.original: Sensors are showing enemy movement beyond our initial count. Be advised you might meet with increased resistance.
content.prevOriginal: Sensors are showing enemy movement beyond our initial count. Be advised you might meet with increased resistance.
content.content: Сенсоры показывают передвижение неизвестных целей. Имейте в виду: вы можете столкнуться с повышенным сопротивлением.

content.original: Commander, the target is bugging out! Eliminate them before they escape.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, the target is bugging out! Eliminate them before they escape.
content.content: Командир, цель пытается сбежать! Догоните и уничтожьте ее, пока не поздно.

content.original: Sounds like we'll be hitting a middle manager. Not much glory, but it pays. The target won't be alone, Commander, and there's a bonus if we clean up the escorting units. Still, if things get too hot, we can always hit and run.
content.prevOriginal: Sounds like we'll be hitting a middle manager. Not much glory, but it pays. The target won't be alone, Commander, and there's a bonus if we clean up the escorting units. Still, if things get too hot, we can always hit and run.
content.content: Похоже, мы будем атаковать менеджера среднего звена. Не много славы, но оно того стоит. Цель будет не одна, командир, и если мы устраним отряды сопровождения, то получим премию. Тем не менее, если станет слишком жарко, мы всегда можем ударить и убежать.

content.original: Destroy Supporting Enemy Forces
content.prevOriginal: Destroy Supporting Enemy Forces
content.content: Уничтожьте вражеский отряд поддержки

content.original: Destroy enemy Ambushers before extraction
content.prevOriginal: Destroy enemy Ambushers before extraction
content.content: Уничтожьте засаду врага до эвакуации

content.original: Eliminate Ambushers
content.prevOriginal: Eliminate Ambushers
content.content: Устраните засаду

content.original: Destroy Target Unit
content.prevOriginal: Destroy Target Unit
content.content: Уничтожьте цель

content.original: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance
content.prevOriginal: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance
content.content: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance

content.original: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective
content.prevOriginal: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective
content.content: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective

content.original: Get to the Evac Zone
content.prevOriginal: Get to the Evac Zone
content.content: Доберитесь до зоны эвакуации

content.original: Stop the Target from Escaping
content.prevOriginal: Stop the Target from Escaping
content.content: Не дайте цели сбежать

content.original: Armor of the Target is breached.
content.prevOriginal: Armor of the Target is breached.
content.content: Броня цели повреждена.

content.original: Armor Breached
content.prevOriginal: Armor Breached
content.content: Броня пробита

content.original: We have an opportunity to eliminate a key figure in the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} hierarchy in this system, which will leave their organization in chaos and ensure safety for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} operations. The target will be relatively unguarded and vulnerable, and we'd like you to strike in this window of opportunity.
content.prevOriginal: We have an opportunity to eliminate a key figure in the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} hierarchy in this system, which will leave their organization in chaos and ensure safety for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} operations. The target will be relatively unguarded and vulnerable, and we'd like you to strike in this window of opportunity.
content.content: У нас есть возможность устранить ключевую фигуру из {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} в этой системе, что ввергнет их на время в хаос и обеспечит безопасность операций {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym}. Цель будет относительно беззащитной и уязвимой, но не долго и мы хотели бы, чтобы вы нанесли быстрый удар в это время.

content.original: Middle Management
content.prevOriginal: Middle Management
content.content: Менеджмент среднего звена

content.original: Commander, our intel was right; the target is in the AO and only lightly guarded.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, our intel was right; the target is in the AO and only lightly guarded.
content.content: Командующий, наша информация была верна: цель находится в указанном районе и слабо охраняется.

content.original: We're seeing a lot of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} activity nearby. That's probably our target.
content.prevOriginal: We're seeing a lot of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} activity nearby. That's probably our target.
content.content: Мы наблюдаем много активности от {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} поблизости. Вероятно, это наша цель.

content.original: Take them out, get to the evac zone, and then we get paid.
content.prevOriginal: Take them out, get to the evac zone, and then we get paid.
content.content: Разбейте их, доберитесь до зоны эвакуации и тогда нам заплатят.

content.original: The target is down, Commander. Well done.
content.prevOriginal: The target is down, Commander. Well done.
content.content: Цель уже не встанет, командир. Отлично сработано.

content.original: I'm scrubbing the mission, Commander. What a disaster.
content.prevOriginal: I'm scrubbing the mission, Commander. What a disaster.
content.content: Я отменяю задание, командир. Это катастрофа.

content.original: Target eliminated. That's a confirmed kill. Let's get out of here.
content.prevOriginal: Target eliminated. That's a confirmed kill. Let's get out of here.
content.content: Цель устранена. Убийство подтверждаю. Выбирайтесь оттуда.

content.original: Readings indicate the ambushing units are out of commission. The employer will be pleased.
content.prevOriginal: Readings indicate the ambushing units are out of commission. The employer will be pleased.
content.content: Насколько я вижу, враг уже не устроит тут засады. Работодатель будет доволен.

content.prevOriginal: That is our target, sustain fire on that unit!

content.prevOriginal: Sounds like we'll be hitting a middle manager. The target won't be alone, Commander, and there's a bonus if we clean up the escorting units as well. Still, if things get too hot, we can always hit and run.

content.content: Броня пробита

content.original: Our intelligence operatives believe that a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} leader is present and vulnerable on the surface of {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. Eliminating them will leave their organization in shambles and clear the field for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} operations. The target will be relatively unguarded, and we'd like you to strike during this window of opportunity.
content.prevOriginal: Our intelligence operatives believe that a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} leader is present and vulnerable on the surface of {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. Eliminating them will leave their organization in shambles and clear the field for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} operations. The target will be relatively unguarded, and we'd like you to strike during this window of opportunity.
content.content: Наши разведчики полагают, что лидер {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} присутствует на поверхности {TGT_SYSTEM.name} и уязвим. Его устранение приведёт к беспорядку в их организации и расчистит поле для дальнейших операций {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym}. Цель будет относительно беззащитной и мы хотели бы, чтобы вы нанесли удар, пока есть возможность.

content.original: Recruitment Drive
content.prevOriginal: Recruitment Drive
content.content: Прием на работу

content.original: We've arrived at the coordinates provided by our employers.
content.prevOriginal: We've arrived at the coordinates provided by our employers.
content.content: Мы прибыли по координатам, указанным нашими работодателями.

content.original: This is where the last transmission from the surface originated from.
content.prevOriginal: This is where the last transmission from the surface originated from.
content.content: Отсюда была перехвачена последняя передача с поверхности.

content.original: Engage and destroy the target, then proceed to the evac zone.
content.prevOriginal: Engage and destroy the target, then proceed to the evac zone.
content.content: Вступите в бой и уничтожьте цель, затем перейдите в зону эвакуации.

content.original: Well done, Commander. Let's debrief back in orbit.
content.prevOriginal: Well done, Commander. Let's debrief back in orbit.
content.content: Молодец, командир. Возвращайтесь на орбиту.

content.original: I'm pulling the plug on this mission, Commander. We'll debrief when we get home.
content.prevOriginal: I'm pulling the plug on this mission, Commander. We'll debrief when we get home.
content.content: Я прекращаю операцию, командир. Мы подведем итоги, когда вернемся домой.

content.original: I guess he should have stayed retired. Head to the designated LZ, commander, and let's get out of here.
content.prevOriginal: I guess he should have stayed retired. Head to the designated LZ, commander, and let's get out of here.
content.content: Думаю, ему следовало оставаться на пенсии. Направляйтесь к точке эвакуации, командир, и давайте убираться отсюда.

content.original: Readings indicate the ambushing units are out of commission. The employer will be pleased.
content.prevOriginal: Readings indicate the ambushing units are out of commission. The employer will be pleased.
content.content: Насколько я вижу, враг уже не устроит тут засады. Работодатель будет доволен.

content.original: That is our target, sustain fire on that unit!
content.prevOriginal: That is our target, sustain fire on that unit!
content.content: А вот и наш друг. Как насчёт оказать ему горячий приём?

content.original: Sensors are showing enemy movement beyond our initial count. Be advised you might meet with increased resistance.
content.prevOriginal: Sensors are showing enemy movement beyond our initial count. Be advised you might meet with increased resistance.
content.content: Сенсоры показывают передвижение неизвестных целей. Имейте в виду: вы можете столкнуться с повышенным сопротивлением.

content.original: Commander, the target is bugging out! Eliminate them before they escape.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, the target is bugging out! Eliminate them before they escape.
content.content: Командир, цель пытается сбежать! Догоните и уничтожьте ее, пока не поздно.

content.original: His 'Mech may be heavy, Commander, but I don't see a lot of 'Mech repair facilities out here, so this might not be as difficult as it looks.
content.prevOriginal: His 'Mech may be heavy, Commander, but I don't see a lot of 'Mech repair facilities out here, so this might not be as difficult as it looks.
content.content: Его мех может быть тяжелым, командир, но я не вижу здесь много ремонтных мастерских, так что это может быть не так сложно, как кажется.

content.original: The secondary objective to destroy an additional lance supporting the assassination target.
content.prevOriginal: The secondary objective to destroy an additional lance supporting the assassination target.
content.content: Вторая цель: уничтожьте дополнительное копье поддержки.

content.prevOriginal: Destroy Enemy Escort
content.content: Уничтожьте вражеский эскорт

content.prevOriginal: Destroy enemy Ambushers before extraction
content.content: Уничтожьте засаду врага до эвакуации

content.original: Destroy Ambushers
content.prevOriginal: Destroy Ambushers
content.content: Уничтожьте засаду

content.original: The objective to destroy the Assassination Target.
content.prevOriginal: The objective to destroy the Assassination Target.
content.content: Задача: уничтожьте заказанную цель.

content.original: Destroy Veteran MechWarrior
content.prevOriginal: Destroy Veteran MechWarrior
content.content: Уничтожьте ветерана мехвоина

content.prevOriginal: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance
content.content: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance

content.prevOriginal: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective
content.content: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective

content.original: The objective for the player to escape and complete the mission.
content.prevOriginal: The objective for the player to escape and complete the mission.
content.content: Цель игрока сбежать и завершить миссию.

content.original: Get to the Evac Zone
content.prevOriginal: Get to the Evac Zone
content.content: Доберитесь до зоны эвакуации

content.original: The objective to stop the assassination target for escaping, the player will fail if the target escapes.
content.prevOriginal: The objective to stop the assassination target for escaping, the player will fail if the target escapes.
content.content: Задача: остановить бегство отмеченной цели, игрок потерпит неудачу, если цель сбежит.

content.original: Stop the Target from Escaping
content.prevOriginal: Stop the Target from Escaping
content.content: Не дайте цели сбежать

content.original: Armor of the Target is breached.
content.prevOriginal: Armor of the Target is breached.
content.content: Броня цели повреждена.

content.original: Armor Breached
content.prevOriginal: Armor Breached
content.content: Броня пробита

content.original: Our spies report that a veteran {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} MechWarrior from the Succession Wars retired to this system, and {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} would very much like to keep him retired. Permanently if possible. We've been monitoring a DropShip in orbit around the planet, and believe that they're preparing for a pickup. We need you to drop and intercept this MechWarrior before he can be reactivated. He's likely in a fairly heavy 'Mech, so be careful when you engage him.
content.prevOriginal: Our spies report that a veteran {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} MechWarrior from the Succession Wars retired to this system, and {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} would very much like to keep him retired. Permanently if possible. We've been monitoring a DropShip in orbit around the planet, and believe that they're preparing for a pickup. We need you to drop and intercept this MechWarrior before he can be reactivated. He's likely in a fairly heavy 'Mech, so be careful when you engage him.
content.content: Наши шпионы сообщают, что ветеран {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} времён Войн за Наследие ушёл на пенсию и поселился в этой системе. Люди из {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} очень хотели бы, чтобы он и дальше оставался в отставке. И если возможно - навсегда. Мы наблюдаем за десантным кораблем на орбите вокруг планеты и полагаем, что они готовятся подобрать кого-то. Нам нужно, чтобы вы высадились и перехватили этого мехвоина, прежде чем он встретится со своими. Скорее всего, он пилотирует довольно тяжелый мех, поэтому будьте осторожны.
